attributes.action: The UK should accept the EU COVID certificate for fully vaccinated people.
attributes.additional_details: As the same types of vaccines are accepted by the EU as by the UK, EU COVID certificates are proof of being vaccinated by vaccines that are also accepted in the UK.
attributes.background: The UK to recognise the EU COVID certificate as it accepts the NHS COVID pass. People having the EU pass are not being granted the same rights as the NHS pass. Making them quarantine, pay for COVID tests, unabling us to go straight back to work or education on returning to the UK.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/587985
